welcome_message:
🚀✨ Get ready for an exciting space adventure\! 
🌌 Dash through galaxies, 🌠 collect gold 💰, tokens 🪙, and real rewards 🎁\. 

Dodge obstacles ⚡️, outsmart enemies 👾, and beat your friends 🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️ to become the ultimate space explorer\! 🌟 

🚀🪐Start your odyssey now and see how far you can go\! 🚀🪐
